Test Name: Postmortem Primary Hemophagocytic Lymphohistiocytosis (HLH) Gene Panel
Specimen Type: Fresh tissue or formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue
Purpose: To detect and characterize genetic variants associated with primary HLH from postmortem tissue samples.
Container: Cryogenic tube for fresh tissue stored at -80 Â°C or FFPE tissue block
Equipment: Microtome, tissue homogenizer, centrifuge, PCR thermocycler, sequencing platform
